text: Sadanand Atmaram "Nandu" Bhende (; c. 1956 - 11 April 2014) was an Indian musician, singer-songwriter and actor. He was best known for being a member of bands such as Nandu Bhende Band, Savage Encounter, The Brief Encounter and Velvette Fogg. He performed mostly under blues, pop, rock, and soul music genres. Bhende died from a heart attack on 11 April 2014 in Mumbai, Maharashtra. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1950s births Category:2014 deaths Category:Asian Jews Category:Blues musicians Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian singer-songwriters Category:Jewish actors Category:Jewish musicians Category:Pop musicians Category:Rock singers Category:Soul musicians
title: Nandu Bhende
